#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
int main()
{
       char s[101],ans[101];
       gets(s);
       int n=strlen(s);
       int i,j=0;
       for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
              if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u')
              {
                     ans[j++]=s[i];
                     i+=2;
              }
              else
                     ans[j++]=s[i];
       }
       for(i=0;i<j;i++)
              printf("%c",ans[i]);

return 0;
}
